awards:
第15届东京国际电影节(2002)
　　主竞赛单元 最佳影片(提名) 南·特里维尼·阿克纳斯

director.name: 南·特里维尼·阿克纳斯 Nan Triveni Achnas

introduction: After school on Saturday afternoon, a teacher asks her 6th grade students, Budi and Rosi, to take charge of raising the flag for next Monday's ceremony. Because the flag is dirty, the teacher asks them to take it home and to wash it. The kids go through many adventures as a result of taking the flag home. They nevertherless feel responsible to protect the flag until Monday's ceremony.
